A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow! Cannot believe they released this movie to the public. This was an awful star wars movie. It felt more like Guardians of the Galaxy 3 with all the terrible jokes and plot contrivances. Hate what they did to Luke. Did not match his character at all.  This was a very disappointing movie. I laughed out loud in the theater when Leia floated through space lol. Could not believe that.
